analyzed: padesa lakkhaṇehi samannāgato padesa bodhisatto ti
ti bhāga lakkhaṇehi samannāgataḥ ti bhāga bodhisatto ti
upaḍḍha lakkhaṇehi samannāgataḥ upaḍḍha bodhisatto ti
cakkavatti satto lakkhaṇa samannāgato cakkavatti satto bodhisatto ti
cakkavatti satto lakkhaṇa samannāgato cakkavatti satto bodhisatto ti

original: Yādiso bodhisattassa pubbayogo pubbacariyā dhammakkhānaṁ dhammadesanā, tādiso cakkavattisattassa pubbayogo pubbacariyā dhammakkhānaṁ dhammadesanāti?
analyzed: yādisaḥ bodhisattassa pubba yogaḥ pubba cariyā dhammakkhānam dhamma desanā tādisaḥ cakkavatti sattassa pubba yogaḥ pubba cariyā dhammakkhānam dhamma desanā ati

original: Yathā bodhisattassa jāyamānassa devā paṭhamaṁ paṭiggaṇhanti pacchā manussā, evamevaṁ cakkavattisattassa jāyamānassa devā paṭhamaṁ paṭiggaṇhanti pacchā manussāti?
analyzed: yathā bodhisattassa jāyamānassa devā paṭhamam paṭiggaṇhanti pacchā manussā evam evam cakkavatti sattassa jāyamānassa devā paṭhamam paṭiggaṇhanti pacchā manussā ati

original: Yathā bodhisattassa jāyamānassa cattāro naṁ devaputtā paṭiggahetvā mātu purato ṭhapenti—
analyzed: yathā bodhisattassa jāyamānassa cattāraḥ nam deva puttā paṭiggahetvā mātu puratas ṭhapenti

original: Mahesakkho te putto uppanno”ti, evamevaṁ cakkavattisattassa jāyamānassa cattāro naṁ devaputtā paṭiggahetvā mātu purato ṭhapenti—
analyzed: mahesakkhaḥ te putto uppanno ti evam evam cakkavatti sattassa jāyamānassa cattāro nam deva puttā paṭiggahetvā mātu puratas ṭhapenti

original: Yathā bodhisattassa jāyamānassa dve udakassa dhārā antalikkhā pātubhavanti—
analyzed: yathā bodhisattassa jāyamānassa dve udakassa dhārāḥ antalikkhā pātubhavanti

original: yena bodhisattassa udakakiccaṁ karonti mātu ca, evamevaṁ cakkavattisattassa jāyamānassa dve udakassa dhārā antalikkhā pātubhavanti—
analyzed: yena bodhisattassa udaka kiccam karonti mātu ca evam evam cakkavatti sattassa jāyamānassa dve udakassa dhārāḥ antalikkhā pātubhavanti

original: yena cakkavattisattassa udakakiccaṁ karonti mātu cāti?
analyzed: yena cakkavatti sattassa udaka kiccam karonti mātu ca ati

original: Yathā sampatijāto bodhisatto samehi pādehi patiṭṭhahitvā uttarena abhimukho sattapadavītihārena
analyzed: yathā sampati jātaḥ bodhisattaḥ samehi pādehi patiṭṭhahitvā uttarena abhimukhaḥ satta pada vītihārena

original: gacchati setamhi chatte anudhāriyamāne, sabbā ca disā viloketi, āsabhiñca vācaṁ bhāsati—
analyzed: gacchati setamhi chatte anudhāriyamāne sabbā ca disā viloketi āsabhiḥ ca vācam bhāsati

original: “aggohamasmi lokassa, jeṭṭhohamasmi lokassa, seṭṭhohamasmi lokassa, ayamantimā jāti,
analyzed: aggaḥ uham asmi lokassa jeṭṭhaḥ uham asmi lokassa seṭṭhaḥ uham asmi lokassa ayam antimā jāti

original: natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti, evamevaṁ sampatijāto cakkavattisatto samehi pādehi patiṭṭhahitvā
analyzed: natthi dāni punabbhavaḥ ti evam evam sampatijātaḥ cakkavatti satto samehi pādehi patiṭṭhahitvā

original: uttarena abhimukho sattapadavītihārena gacchati setamhi chatte anudhāriyamāne, sabbā
analyzed: uttarena abhimukhaḥ satta padavī tihārena gacchati setamhi chatte anudhāriyamāne sabbā

original: ca disā viloketi, āsabhiñca vācaṁ bhāsati—
analyzed: ca disā vilokā iti āsabhiḥ ca vācam bhāsati

original: “aggohamasmi lokassa, jeṭṭhohamasmi lokassa, seṭṭhohamasmi lokassa, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti?
analyzed: aggaḥ ham asmi lokassa jeṭṭhaḥ ham asmi lokassa seṭṭhaḥ ham asmi lokassa ayam antimā jāti natthi dāni punabbhavaḥ ti

original: Yathā bodhisattassa jāyamānassa mahato ālokassa mahato obhāsassa mahato bhūmicālassa
analyzed: yathā bodhisattassa jāyamānassa mahataḥ ālokassa mahataḥ obhāsassa mahataḥ bhūmicālassa

original: pātubhāvo hoti, evamevaṁ cakkavattisattassa jāyamānassa mahato ālokassa mahato obhāsassa
analyzed: pātubhāvaḥ hoti evam evam cakkavatti sattassa jāyamānassa mahataḥ ālokassa mahataḥ obhāsassa

original: Yathā bodhisattassa pakatikāyo samantā byāmaṁ obhāsati, evamevaṁ cakkavattisattassa pakatikāyo samantā byāmaṁ obhāsatīti?
analyzed: yathā bodhisattassa pakati kāyo samantā byāmam obhāsati evam evam cakkavatti sattassa pakati kāyo samantā byāmam obhāsati iti

original: Yathā bodhisatto mahāsupinaṁ passati, evamevaṁ cakkavattisatto mahāsupinaṁ passatīti?
analyzed: yathā bodhisattaḥ mahā supinam passati evam evam cakkavatti sattaḥ mahā supinam passati iti

original: “dvattiṁsimāni, bhikkhave, mahāpurisassa mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni, yehi samannāgatassa mahāpurisassa dveva gatiyo bhavanti anaññā.
analyzed: bhikkhave mahā purisassa mahāpurisa lakkhaṇāni yehi samannāgatassa mahā purisassa dvā iva gatiyaḥ bhavanti anaññā

original: Sace agāraṁ ajjhāvasati, rājā hoti cakkavattī dhammiko dhammarājā cāturanto vijitāvī janapadatthāvariyappatto sattaratanasamannāgato.
analyzed: sace agāram ajjhāvasati rājā hoti cakkavattī dhammikaḥ dhamma rājā cāturantaḥ vijitāvī janapadatthāvariya ppatto satta ratana samannāgato

original: cakkaratanaṁ, hatthiratanaṁ, assaratanaṁ, maṇiratanaṁ, itthiratanaṁ, gahapatiratanaṁ, pariṇāyakaratanameva sattamaṁ.
analyzed: cakka ratana hatthi ratana assa ratana maṇi ratana itthi ratana gahapati ratana pariṇāyaka ratanam eva sattama

original: Parosahassaṁ kho panassa puttā bhavanti sūrā vīraṅgarūpā parasenappamaddanā.
analyzed: parosahassam kho panassa puttāḥ bhavanti sūrāḥ vīraṅga rūpāḥ para sena ppamaddanāḥ

original: So imaṁ pathaviṁ sāgarapariyantaṁ adaṇḍena asatthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhāvasati.
analyzed: saḥ imam pathavim sāgara pariyantam a daṇḍena a satthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhāvasati

original: Sace kho pana agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajati, arahaṁ hoti sammāsambuddho loke vivaṭṭacchado”ti.
analyzed: sace kho pana agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajati araham hoti sammāsambuddhaḥ loke vivaṭṭa chadā iti
tena hi lakkhaṇa samannāgataḥ bodhisatto ti
